  • HW2 (pdf) (solutions). Deadline: 2/12/2019, 11:55 PM.
  • Sample midterm questions (pdf) (solutions).
  • HW3 (pdf) (solutions) (solutions updated on 3/12/2019). Deadline: 3/4/2019, 11:55 PM.
  • HW4 (pdf) (solutions). Deadline: 3/15/2019, 11:55 PM.

Policies

  • Late submissions: There is a penalty for late homework submissions. You will lose 10% of the grade for every late hour.
  • Extra credit points: HW2, HW3, and HW4 have extra credit points. That is, the homework has 150 points instead of 100 points. That is 50 extra credit points. You can use these credit points to compensate for other written homeworks. These extra credit points will not help with your grades for midterm, final, or project. They only help with your written homeworks (20% of your overall grade).
